``` {r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  actionButton("reset", "Clear"),
  hr()
)

server <- function(input, output){
  v <- reactiveValues(data = NULL)
  
  observeEvent(input$reset, {
    v$data <- NULL
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
